test-case.name: fn-substring-before-1
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-1 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = ""

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-2
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-2 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-3
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-3 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-4
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-4 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = ""

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-5
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-5 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = ()

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-6
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-6 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A Character String" $arg2 = ()

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-7
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-7 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-8
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-8 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBBCCCCC" $arg2 = "BBBBB"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-9
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-9 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBB" $arg2 = " "

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-10
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-10 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = " " $arg2 = " AAAAABBBBB"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-11
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-11 Evaluates The "substring-before" function using it as a argument of a fn:not - returns true

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-12
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-12 Evaluates The "substring-before" function using it as a argument of a fn:not - returns true

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-13
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-13 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string("A") $arg2 = "A"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-14
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-14 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = xs:string("A")

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-15
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-15 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = "a"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-16
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-16 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "a" $arg2 = "A"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-17
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-17 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-before" $arg2 = "substring-before"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-18
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-18 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-beforesubstring-before" $arg2 = "substring-before"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-19
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-19 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "****" $arg2 = "***"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-20
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-20 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "12345" $arg2 = "2345"

test-case.name: fn-substring-before-21
test-case.description: fn-substring-before-21 Evaluates The "substring-before" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "substring-before $arg2 = "erofeb-gnirtsbus ("substring-before" backwards)

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-1
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-1 A test whose essence is: `substring-before()`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-2
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-2 A test whose essence is: `substring-before(())`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-3
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-3 A test whose essence is: `substring-before((), (), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-4
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-4 A test whose essence is: `substring-before("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-5
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-5 A test whose essence is: `substring-before("foo", "oo", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint") eq "f"`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-6
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-6 A test whose essence is: `substring-before("tattoo", "attoo") eq "t"`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-7
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-7 A test whose essence is: `substring-before("tattoo", "tatto") eq ""`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-8
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-8 A test whose essence is: `substring-before((), ()) eq ""`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-9
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-9 A test whose essence is: `substring-before("a string", "") eq ""`.

test-case.name: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-10
test-case.description: K-SubstringBeforeFunc-10 A test whose essence is: `substring-before("a string", "not in other") eq ""`.

test-case.name: cbcl-substring-before-001
test-case.description: test fn:substring-before with collation and empty string
